subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: how to transcribe air and ear
msgSnippet: ... No. I mean doubt. ... Great. Now you tell me. Paul
messageBody:
John Cowan wrote:

>
> If by "doubt" you mean "ignorance", then I'll agree.

No. I mean doubt.


>
> True. I've used JQS just a little bit, trying to get familiar with how
> to write it and how it differs from Shavian. I'm certainly not an
> extensive user of it, though if I felt the need to use shorthand I might
> become one.
>

Great. Now you tell me.

Paul
